name: Incredible Illuminati Adventure Across The Universe (Clicker)
name_original: Incredible Illuminati Adventure Across The Universe (Clicker)
description:
After the humans discovered them, the secret order of the world had to escape. Now you as a leader will have to make the right decisions to take the illuminati back to supermacy, but be careful that in the vast universe are your declared enemies: the cubitos. Always be careful. Your resources are limited, but dont cry for your inminent death, you can destroy planetoids or invade others planets to get resources. Now, what are you waiting? Let's start with this Incredible Illuminati Adventure Across The Universe!

Made for the Clicker Jam in three days.

Visit our page.
